title: Govt., UNP to discuss creation of Executive Prime Ministership To replace Executive Presidency We want a people friendly constitution – Ranil
content: The government and the United National Party yesterday agreed to discuss a series of electoral and constitutional changes including the creation of an Executive Prime Ministership to replace the Executive Presidency. Leader of the UNP Ranil Wickremesinghe told a news conference in Colombo that a consensus had been reached during yesterday’s meeting between delegations from…
